title: Hunter expresses optimism about foot
subtitle: Hunter shows optimism about foot at TwinsFest
body: MINNEAPOLIS -- He's heard all of the questions and he's answered them time and time again, so Torii Hunter wanted to make sure that the message came across loud and clear at TwinsFest on Saturday.  "The foot is just fine," Hunter said with a laugh. "There should be no worries."  Since fracturing his left ankle at the end of July in a game against the Red Sox, Hunter has been spending his time completing rehabilitation on the foot. Months have passed, but the questions as to how the foot feels just keep on coming. Kelly Thesier  is a reporter for MLB.com. author: Kelly Thesier
